projects.title: Android/IOS Infinite Runner
projects.summary: An endless runner game like Monster Dash made by using the Corona SDK. I designed the art for this game and also programmed it with Lua.

projects.title: Let's Go - A GISWORX 2014 Developer Challenge 1st place winner
projects.summary: An android application that makes use of the ARCGIS SDK & OSM to help the user get around Dubai by providing directions with different transport modes. User can also pin a location they want to visit and strike it out once they've visited.

projects.title: Fittbug - A GITEX 2014 Top 10 lifestyle Android App
projects.summary: Developed & designed by me, Fittbug monitors where you are and recommends alternative healither places & rewards you for it with coupons/vouchers to use.

projects.title: Snapple - Winner for most Educational game for WISTEM 2015
projects.summary: A java based desktop game made using LibGDX during the WISTEM hackathon. I designed and did the front-end development and debugging for the project.
